user.title: HA CRUD REST API
user.description:
This integration exposes REST API endpoints for managing Home Assistant resources.

After setup, use the Configure button to customize which APIs are enabled.

Documentation: [{docs_url}]({docs_url})

abort.already_configured: HA CRUD REST API is already configured.

init.title: Configure HA CRUD REST API
init.description: Select a category to configure its API endpoints.

discovery.title: Discovery APIs
discovery.description: Configure read-only discovery endpoints. These APIs allow querying entities, devices, areas, and other Home Assistant resources.

data_description.discovery_entities: List and get entity states, attributes, and registry info
data_description.discovery_devices: List and get device info, manufacturer, model
data_description.discovery_areas: List and get areas and floors with device/entity counts
data_description.discovery_integrations: List active integrations with config entries and devices
data_description.discovery_services: List available services with parameters and selectors

data_description.dashboards_read: List dashboards, get dashboard metadata and configuration
